participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Determined and disciplined, with a passion for sports and fitness.
participant_1.background: i am a gold medalist olympian. i workout four hours a day. my favorite color is yellow. i love italian food and garlic bread. gymnastics is my favorite sport.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and family-oriented, enjoys casual meals and spending time with pets.
participant_2.background: i've one brother. i like tacos. i've three sisters. i love dogs.
